## [Bio]{.underline}

My name is Christopher Maronga, I hail from the beautiful landscapes of Kenya, East Africa.

I have a wealth of experience managing and analysing healthcare data for decision-making, as well as teaching introductory and advanced courses in R.

I'm passionate about reproducible research, automating data products, statistical computing, and data visualization.
